meaningMnemonic: <radical>Orders</radical> coming from your <radical>mouth</radical> will determine the <kanji>fate</kanji> of your soldiers. You are their commanding officer and your orders determine their <kanji>life</kanji> and death.
readingMnemonic: You are the commanding officer on the <reading>May</reading>flower (めい). You give orders to colonize America. The orders spewing from your mouth hole determine the <kanji>fate</kanji> of the settlers and the fate of America and the fate of the world! You and the Mayflower have changed everything forever.
